root.name: Cross Country Canada
root.description: OverviewReleased in 1991 for Elementary schools all over Canada. An equivalent to Oregon Trail with a contemporary Canadian Twist. You're a truck driver picking up and delivering commodities all across Canada. Dropping things off to 80 different Cities. Mainly a tool to teach children the geography of Canada.Controls are mainly text based, with commands such a "turn on motor" and "W" to display the weather.
